depositUSDT(uint256,string).details: Deposit USDT tokens to the contract

params.amount: Amount of USDT to deposit (in smallest unit - 6 decimals)

emergencyWithdraw().details: Emergency withdraw all USDT from contract (only owner)

getAvailableBalance(address).details: Get user's available balance for withdrawal

returns._contractBalance: Current USDT balance of the contract
returns._totalUsers: Total number of users who have deposited

returns._0: UserBalance struct with user's balance information

params.limit: Maximum number of transactions to return

returns._0: Array of transaction IDs for the user

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendUSDTToAddress(address,uint256,string.details: Send USDT to any address (only owner)

params.amount: Amount of USDT to send (in smallest unit - 6 decimals)

setUSDTToken(address).details: Set the USDT token address (only owner)

params.tokenAddress: The address of the USDT token contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
